name: Calculate Annuity from /calc-annuity rest service

children.description: Given details of "5000" , "5.0" and '24' to create calculate annuity request payload
When user invoke rest service to calculate annuity
Then validate correct annuity "219.36" is calculated successfully
Given details of "5000" , "5.0" and '12' to create calculate annuity request payload
When user invoke rest service to calculate annuity
Then validate correct annuity "428.04" is calculated successfully

dataTable.scenarioOutline:

When user invoke rest service to calculate annuity
Then validate correct annuity "<expectedAnnuity>" is calculated successfully
